name: LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Robot Graphics File

description: To create an RGF file with the Image Editor tool in LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3:
LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 saves the RGF in an .EV3 project. To view your RGF file(s) in a project, go to your project, click the wrench icon, and select the "Images" tab.

To export the RGF file from a project and share it with other LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 users, click the wrench icon at the top left of the Project screen in the application, select your RGF file under the "Images" tab, click Export at the bottom of the window, name your file, choose the save location, and click Save .
